# MySqlConnectionStringBuilder.SslKey property

The path to the client’s SSL private key in PEM format. [`SslCert`](../SslCert/) must also be specified, and [`CertificateFile`](../CertificateFile/) should not be.

```csharp
public string SslKey { get; set; }
```
